item.title: Linkin Park
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

ninja nub:

It’s ok. I don’t like the colors though… And for it being linkin park… -10/10.

Wow… Just cause it was a band you liked u made it the best…? [quote=“step one, post:8, topic:190902”]Not only add new colors, put them in more places maybe? Besides Linkin Park is a pussy band tbh =[ 3/10[/quote]
First of all, that makes me think less of you if you’re gonna rate an image based on it’s render itself like if it’s spongebob or patrick and you think patrick sucks. So now I think less of you. Don’t post in the graphics section anymore please. Thanks.
And if you had real taste in music then you would see that they don’t suck.[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:9, topic:190902”]If he didn’t say Linkin Park in the title. You all would have not a fucking thing to complain about, other than the image. Don’t use the band as an excuse to give him a bad rating. It shows you cannot accurately judge images. You find an excuse for giving him a bad rating, other than the image itself.[/quote]
Nice job ThAt. I’m basically saying the same thing. You beat me to it. =P

Read full topic

item.title: Linkin Park
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I have to agree. The Pallet of colors is too close together. And not appealing. It stays under one color scheme, which is good. But it’s a bad color scheme. I suggest a dark green, like Olive, with an aqua blue, and a peach color similiar to that, use the peach as a highlight, the Olive as an undertone, and the aqua as a blend. Then fill in with your own color choice within those areas. maybe a darker shade of blue. The text does need an immense amount of work. I suggest using a similar Gothic font, with a darken overlay. Or something of the sort.

3/10

Read full topic
